description: In this study, we introduce a streamlined pipeline using customized and concatenated GENCODE and neXtProt databases with controlled false discovery rate (FDR) for finding GENCODE ASVs and missing proteins while mapping onto single amino acid variants (SAAVs) from Hippocampal dataset.

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Hwang H, Park GW, Park JY, Lee HK, Lee JY, Jeong JE, Park SR, Yates JR, Kwon KH, Park YM, Lee HJ, Paik YK, Kim JY, Yoo JS. Next Generation Proteomic Pipeline for Chromosome-Based Proteomic Research Using NeXtProt and GENCODE Databases. J. Proteome Res. Epub 2017 Oct 13.
